sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-chart ref="gaugeChart" class="h-[13rem]" :option="gaugeThrippleOptions"/>
</template>

<script>
import resizeChart from "@/mixins/resizeChart";
export default {
  name: "GaugeTrippleChart",
  mixins: [ resizeChart ],
  props: {
    gaugeData: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => {}
    },
    colorSection: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => {}
    },
  },
  data() {
    const self = this
    return {
      gaugeThrippleOptions: {
        series: [
          {
            type: 'gauge',
            radius: '100%',
            center: ["50%", "70%"],
            startAngle: 200,
            endAngle: -20,
            anchor: {
              show: true,
              showAbove: true,
              size: 15,
              itemStyle: {
                color: '#6A38EB'
              }
            },
            pointer: {
              icon: 'path://M2090.36389,615.30999 L2090.36389,615.30999 C2091.48372,615.30999 2092.40383,616.194028 2092.44859,617.312956 L2096.90698,728.755929 C2097.05155,732.369577 2094.2393,735.416212 2090.62566,735.56078 C2090.53845,735.564269 2090.45117,735.566014 2090.36389,735.566014 L2090.36389,735.566014 C2086.74736,735.566014 2083.81557,732.63423 2083.81557,729.017692 C2083.81557,728.930412 2083.81732,728.84314 2083.82081,728.755929 L2088.2792,617.312956 C2088.32396,616.194028 2089.24407,615.30999 2090.36389,615.30999 Z',
              width: 10,
              length: '90%',
              offsetCenter: [0, 0],
              itemStyle: {
                borderColor: '#fff'
              }
            },
            axisTick: {
              show: false
            },
            axisLabel: {
              show: false
            },
            splitLine: {
              show: false,
              distance: 0
            },
            axisLine: {
              show: true,
              lineStyle: {
                color: [
                  [0.3, self.colorSection.first],
                  [0.7, self.colorSection.second],
                  [1, self.colorSection.third]
                ],
                shadowColor: "rgb(187,187,187)",
                shadowOffsetY: 2.5,
                shadowBlur: 10.5,
                width: 40
              },
            },
            data: [
              {
                value: self.gaugeData.first,
                itemStyle: {
                  color: '#6A38EB'
                }
              },
              {
                value: self.gaugeData.second,
                itemStyle: {
                  color: '#006FFF'
                }
              },
              {
                value: self.gaugeData.third,
                itemStyle: {
                  color: '#FFC500'
                }
              }
            ],
            detail: {
              show: false
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.setRefElement('gaugeChart')
  }
}
</script>
